dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S2184 IS: To designate the community based outpatient clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs located in The Dalles, Oregon, as the “Loren R. Kaufman Memorial Veterans’ Clinic”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Wyden (for himself and Mr. Merkley) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To designate the community based outpatient clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs located in The Dalles, Oregon, as the Loren R. Kaufman Memorial Veterans’ Clinic.

section.header: Loren R. Kaufman Memorial Veterans’ Clinic

subsection.text: The community based outpatient clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs located at 704 Veterans Drive, The Dalles, Oregon, shall after the date of the enactment of this Act be known and designated as the Loren R. Kaufman Memorial Veterans’ Clinic.

Any reference in any law, regulation, map, document, record, or other paper of the United States to the community based outpatient clinic referred to in subsection (a) shall be considered to be a reference to the Loren R. Kaufman Memorial Veterans’ Clinic.
